entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
